name: Farm Defense
description:
Farm Defense is a standalone game inspired by the Warcraft 3 mod ‘Random Farm’. Enjoy the nostalgic experience with new features and content.

Create Your Own Luck
Enjoy a skill based game that has added excitement through random elements. Out skill the random number generator while taking on increasingly difficult enemy waves.

Progression
Enjoy countless hours of fun with multiple difficulties, levels, and unlocks to obtain.

Multiplayer
Embark on a solo journey or battle through the enemy waves with up to 8 friends.

Customization
Unlock characters and cosmetics through the leveling system and display to everyone in the lobby that you are the most skilled.

Control The Market
Manage your resources by choosing which crops to plant and harvest. Each wave the market will have new prices, try to wait for that ‘fire’ day!

Features
40 waves
Difficult bosses
Upgradable damage types
In-game missions
49 defenders
Crop market
